posts.content:
1963 15 Window Deluxe Microbus.

No expense spared.

Folder of receipts detailing spend of over £22,000.

All work has been competed to the highest standard and achievements since completion include:

Volksworld Camper & Bus Front cover feature December 2008. Volksworld Show 2009.
Winner at Volksworld Camper & Bus Big Bang Show 2009.
Winner at VW action 2009.

Spec is as Follows:

Suspension:
4 inch narrowed CB adjustable front beam with T2D dropped spindles. Bus boys straight axle kit at rear with adjustable spring plates. Steel steering rack from Valley Gas Speedshop.

Wheels and Tyres:
Flat 4 detailed chrome fuch. 4.5J Front and 5.5J at rear all with slammed tyres.

Brakes:
Porsche 944 brakes at front and rear with new discs and duel circuit conversion.

Interior:
Original microbus interior recovered with dark and light grey vinyl from Germany by Trimmania (see website for further pictures) and creative deluxe trim all round. All Deluxe goodies still present including Coat of Arms Horn push steering wheel, Coat Hooks, Jail Bars, Blaupunkt Radio, Chrome ashtray, Deluxe Clock, Chrome Speedo surround and CSP shifter. Alpine CD player with IPod connection.

Body:
All original panels and glass. Body re-sprayed in Duralit DG Volkswagen B5B Aquarius Blue and Duralit 2T9 Volkswagen DG Weiss. Polished deluxe trim. Full length creative 6 bow stainless steel rack and original safari windows and pop outs with extra length spoons. Porsche Carrera Headlight grills and original spot lights. All body work straight and in show condition.

Engine:
Brand new Genuine Mexican 1600cc with twin 34 Webers, new gear box, oil breather and new tuck away exhaust.

Please email if you would like additional photos.

Break down of relationship forces reluctant sale.

Email: jamtarts@btinternet.com .

£28900.00 ONO. Tel: (07733) 113263. (Cornwall).
This bus is so right in every way! Seen it at a few shows and its simply gorgeous! Good luck with the sale!
..that is one lovely bus all the best with the sale
